API Reference

spotimoo Module

class spotimoo.spotimoo.Spotimoo(client_id: str, client_secret: str, *, timeout: int = 10)[source]

Bases: object

Spotimoo is a base class that provides an interface to the Spotify API.

Parameters:

  • client_id (str) – Client ID field from Spotify API that must be supplied or set as enviroment variable

  • client_secret (str) – Client Secret field from Spotify API that must be supplied or set as enviroment variable

  • timeout (int, optional) – How long will you have to wait to get a message about a failed request

album(album_id: str) → Response[source]

Request that return response with album information.

Parameters:

album_id (str) –

Album identifier in Spotify. For example:

Link: https://open.spotify.com/album/0XRZpF083HqgygM0v1hQyE?si=fnZU07tQSYuWJrve5LgTOQ

Album ID: 0XRZpF083HqgygM0v1hQyE

Returns:

Response to this request

Return type:

requests.model.Response

artist(artist_id: str) → Response[source]

Request that return response with artist information.

Parameters:

artist_id (str) –

Artist identifier in Spotify. For example:

Link: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4NJhFmfw43RLBLjQvxDuRS?si=RsXekpUYRsWO1t_-oxs2Ew

Artist ID: 4NJhFmfw43RLBLjQvxDuRS

Returns:

Response to this request

Return type:

requests.model.Response

track(track_id: str) → Response[source]

Request that return response with track information.

Parameters:

track_id (str) –

Track identifier in Spotify. For example:

Link: https://open.spotify.com/track/4cOdK2wGLETKBW3PvgPWqT?si=5e9a14dc868948da

Track ID: 4cOdK2wGLETKBW3PvgPWqT

Returns:

Response to this request

Return type:

requests.model.Response

Raises when we got request error.
